long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Can you please just start saying "adults under 40" for "Millennials" because that is now literally what it means. Then see if your thing sounds silly. - Summer Brennan (@summerbrennan).

This extension replaces every instance of 'Millennials' with 'adults under 40', in order to give a better frame of reference to bad millennial takes.

Feel free to send me avocado toast money: https://ko-fi.com/A3203C3E
